serverInfo.name: SharePoint
serverInfo.description: Search and read SharePoint links, news pages, Teams messages and Graph API resources as unified resources. Discover and retrieve sites, lists and files; use write operations only when creating, updating or deleting items in workflows.

instructions: You can read all kind of SharePoint links, news pages, Graph API, Teams message link urls as resources. Also links that are not specified and/or come up from search results.
